meanings.definition: A roll of parchment or paper for writing or painting on.
meanings.sent1: She carefully unrolled the ancient scrolls to reveal the hidden writing.
meanings.sent2: The artist used delicate scrolls to decorate the edges of the paper.
meanings.sent3: The wizard's spell was written on a magical scroll that unfurled on its own.
meanings.sent4: The scrolls of history hold the secrets of the past within their ancient pages.
meanings.sent5: The scrolls in the library whispered stories of long-forgotten lands.

meanings.definition: To move text or graphics up or down on a computer screen.
meanings.sent1: He scrolls through the webpage to find the information he needs.
meanings.sent2: When reading an article online, you can scroll down to continue.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally scrolls through the document with its paw on the touchpad.
meanings.sent4: As she scrolled through the photos, memories of the past flooded back.
meanings.sent5: The teacher showed the students how to scroll through the digital textbook on the screen.
